subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The team has change its name to the Miami Marlins, with splashy new uniforms and a dazzling downtown stadium, but odds are that Manager Ozzie Guillen will continue to do things his way.
snippet: The team has change its name to the Miami Marlins, with splashy new uniforms and a dazzling downtown stadium, but odds are that Manager Ozzie Guillen will continue to do things his way.
